This is because the choice of 'memtable_allocation_type' directly impacts the memory allocation strategy for memtables, which can have a significant effect on system performance. These memory allocation operations are time-expensive and memory-expensive, and the variation in memory allocation strategy can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
